ygData.subject: Re: All this talk
ygData.msgSnippet: From: James Lecouffe Sent: Saturday, May 01, 1999 9:50 AM Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: All this talk ... there blows alittle. But that also gives your foe
ygData.messageBody:
From: James Lecouffe
Sent: Saturday, May 01, 1999 9:50 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: All this talk

>>No way siphion strenth is awsome. You drain there strenth and that weaken
there blows alittle. But that also gives your foe some minor damage. Then
your strenth goes up thats the cool part so you hit harder.<<

Siphon strength does not damage the opponent at all.

It's an good buff/de-buff combo, and it only costs 5 mana. I've also yet to
see it be resisted. As a level 8 Necro, I typically drain 9 points of their
strength to add onto mine. And that strength does last for a while. Lastly,
it's a great cheap spell for attracting a monster's attention.

Brad Cossette - cossettb@...
Sabbaoth (Dark Elf Necro 8) - Bertoxxulous
"My advice to you is to get married. If you find a good wife,
you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher." - Socrates
